welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rancagua, Chile! This beautiful city is known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Rancagua has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: La Picá de la Tia Julia
restaurants.description: La Picá de la Tia Julia is a sandwich spot located in Provincia Cachapoal.
restaurants.address: Rubio 155 (Mujica), Provincia Cachapoal, Sexta Región del Gen

restaurants.description: Comedor Popular is a comfort food restaurant located in the city.
